name: The Villa of Death
description:
**Game is currently still in development. All images and gameplay are subject to updates/changes as we upload new builds**

Ottercide Studio presents La Villa de la Muerte, a looping psychological horror game inspired by the chilling tale of La Llorona. You awaken in town outside of your family's villa, but something's amiss. Family nowhere in sight and stuck in a time loop, you must figure out what happened here and to them. Are you willing to unravel and face the truth?

Looping Environment
Explore the villa as it changes alongside your knowledge of what truly transpired here.

Puzzles
Tour the environment to solve a puzzle in each loop to progress further through the time loop and toward the truth.

AI / Stealth
We lovingly call her Ghost Lady, she's pretty spooky. Hide in wardrobes, sneak under tables, or just run for it to avoid her. She will do whatever it takes to make sure you don't discover what happened.
